title: Google joins with University of Arkansas, A-State systems for artificial intelligence training
description: As part of Google's $4 billion investment in a data center in West Memphis, the tech giant announced that the University of Arkansas and Arkansas State University system will participate in its first cohort of the Google AI for Education Accelerator program.
content: As part of Google's $4 billion investment in a data center in West Memphis, the tech giant announced that the University of Arkansas and Arkansas State University system will participate in its first cohort of the Google AI for Education Accelerator ... [1866 chars]

title: The AI you use daily is changing fast-it's disappearing into everything.
description: Nowhere and everywhere, artificial intelligence is hiding in plain sight—in everything from software to surroundings.
content: AI has begun to shift from standalone apps to integration deep inside the software we use. From there, it’s making its way to becoming embedded in the things we use, such as cars, lights, speakers, and other devices that sense and respond. The Intern... [4355 chars]

title: New AI system revolutionizes drug design and vaccine development
description: The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the field of structural biology. In May 2024, DeepMind and Isomorphic Labs launched AlphaFold 3 (AF3), a revolutionary AI system capable of predicting the 3D structures and interactions of proteins, nucleic acids, small molecules, ions, and other biomolecules with remarkable precision.
content: The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the field of structural biology. In May 2024, DeepMind and Isomorphic Labs launched AlphaFold 3 (AF3), a revolutionary AI system capable of predicting the 3D structures and interac... [1440 chars]

title: AI in School Curriculum: CBSE to introduce artificial intelligence from Class 3 in 2026-27
description: India to integrate AI into school curriculum from Class 3 in 2026-27. CBSE drafting framework; over one crore teachers to be trained for AI learning.
content: The Ministry of Education is set to introduce Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the school curriculum for all students from Class 3 onwards from next academic year (2026-27) and a framework is being developed for AI integration across grades, according... [1702 chars]

title: India’s AI awakening: a tech powerhouse races to reinvent itself
description: Once the world’s outsourced back office, India is now eyeing a future among the superpowers of artificial intelligence.
content:
Back then, he could scarcely imagine that one day it would transform his family’s small property business. But a few years later, the 28-year-old is now using AI to shake up the Indian real estate sector.

title: India s sovereign AI model to be ready by February Meity Secy
description: India’s sovereign artificial intelligence model will be ready before the AI Impact Summit to be held in February, a top IT ministry official said on Friday. title: Apple sued over use of copyrighted books to train Apple Intelligence
description: (Reuters) -Apple was hit with a lawsuit in California federal court by a pair of neuroscientists who say that the tech company misused thousands of copyrighted books to train its Apple Intelligence artificial intelligence model.
content:
(Reuters) -Apple was hit with a lawsuit in California federal court by a pair of neuroscientists who say that the tech company misused thousands of copyrighted books to train its Apple Intelligence artificial intelligence model.

title: Prince Harry, Meghan Markle ask families to join fight against predatory social media policies
description: NEW YORK, Oct 10 : Prince Harry and Meghan Markle urged parents to stand against social media companies that they said prey upon children with exploitative algorithms as the “explosion of unregulated artificial intelligence” adds to their concerns that technologies’ benefits are inseparable from its dangers. To underscore that point, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex cited research from advocacy group ParentsTogether that found researchers posing as children experienced harmful interactions every five minutes they spent with an artificial intelligence […]
content: NEW YORK, Oct 10 : Prince Harry and Meghan Markle urged parents to stand against social media companies that they said prey upon children with exploitative algorithms as the “explosion of unregulated artificial intelligence” adds to their concerns th... [5058 chars]

title: TCS launches AI hub, design studio in London; to create 5,000 UK jobs in 3 years
description: NEW DELHI, Oct 10: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) on Friday announced the launch of an Artificial Intelligence (AI) Experience Zone and Design Studio in London, and said its continued investments in the UK will create 5,000 new jobs across the country over the next three years. Currently, TCS supports over 42,000 direct and indirect jobs across the United Kingdom. In FY2024, TCS contributed 3.3 billion pounds to the UK economy, according to a regulatory filing by the company. “Tata Consultancy […]

title: Why is Nvidia, the world’s leading AI chipmaker, entangled in the US-China trade war?
description: By Auzinea Bacon, CNN (CNN) — Tech giant Nvidia is the world’s leading artificial-intelligence chipmaker, but the company’s success has also put it in the crossfire of trade tensions.
